# kCIInputPoint0Key

**Global Variable**

A key to get or set the coordinate value of a Core Image filter.
The value for this key needs to be a [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIVector] instance containing the `x,y` coordinate.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCIInputPoint0Key: String
```
title: kCIInputPoint0Key
